name: Shari Wagner
bio: Shari Wagner is the author of three poetry books: The Farm Wife's Almanac (Cascadia, 2019), The Harmonist at Nightfall: Poems of Indiana (Bottom Dog Press, 2013), and Evening Chore (Cascadia, 2005). She earned an MFA from Indiana University. She was named Indiana State Poet Laureate for 2016-2017.
